source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with a modern house visible on a cliff to the right. The only movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with a modern house visible on a cliff to the right. The only movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.

generated_critique: The video also shows several boats moving near the sea stack, which should be described if present.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with several boats moving nearby. A modern house is visible on a cliff to the right. The only other movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.
